charges.charge_description: 18:371 - CONSPIRACY TO COMMIT ARSON AND DESTRUCTION OF ENERGY FACILITY(1)

charges.charge_disposition: SENTENCE DATE: 5/25/07; IMPRISONMENT: 108 months (60 months as to count 1 and 108 months as to counts 2-18 to run concurrently with count 1 and each other); SUPERVISED RELEASE: 3 years; RESTITUTION: $994,412,42 payable to Jefferson Poplar Farms; $12,000,000 payable to Vail Resorts Management Co; $1,177,000 payable to Childers Meat Co.; $1,689,593 payable to Boise Cascade; $32,000 payable to BPA; $1,750 payable to City of Eugene for total restituion amount of $15,894,755.42 joint and several with Kevin Tubbs, Stanislas Meyerhoff, Daniel McGowan, Josephine Overaker, Suzanne Savoie, Nathan Block, Joyanna Zacher and Jacob Ferguson; SPECIAL ASSESSMENT: $1,800; Judge Aiken
